column4: Hi I am trying to configure a samba PDC, I go to join the domain and asks for authentication I use root which has been added smbpasswd, but whenever I try to join the domain it tells me "unable to join the domain or domain cannot be contacted" I have a copy of my config at http://71.60.68.165/samba.txt can someone look it over and see what I am doing wrong?
if you're using nautilus try using the ip to contact the computer directy.  In your address bar type "smb://ipadresss
